name: Help Hanady
description:
Story:

A small girl in desert want to back to her home but she can't but she found same of the broken Items in the desert go and help her to fix this Items to can back her to her home.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
    MINIMUM:
    • OS: Windows 8/10/11
    • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.00GHz
    • Memory: 3 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Intel Media Accelerator 500
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 50 MB available space
    RECOMMENDED:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor:  Intel Core 2 Duo Q6867
    • Memory: 6 GB RAM
    • Graphics:  Intel Media Accelerator 500
    • Storage: 50 MB available space
